abstract_summ: Type I and III interferons (IFN-α/β and IFN-λ) are host-produced antiviral cytokines and currently considered as COVID-19 therapy . Here we show that IFN signalling interferes with lung repair during influenza recovery . IFN signals in epithelia, inducing localised antiviral immunity . IfN-induced p53 directly reduces epithelial proliferation and differentiation, increasing disease severity .
